original_text: One of them went out into the field to gather herbs, and found a wild vine and gathered from it his lap full of wild gourds, and came and cut them up into the pot of stew, not knowing what they were.
korean_text: 한 사람이 채소를 캐러 들에 나가 들포도덩굴을 만나 그것에서 들호박을 따서 옷자락에 채워가지고 돌아와 썰어 국 끓이는 솥에 넣되 그들은 무엇인지 알지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: One of them went out into the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람이 밭으로 나갔는데

sentences.original_text: and gathered from it his lap full of wild gourds
sentences.korean_translation: 그것에서 들호박을 그의 품에 가득 모았고

sentences.original_text: and cut them up into the pot of stew
